SEARCH
Module overrungl.stb
Package overrungl.stb

Class STBImage

java.lang.Object
overrungl.stb.STBImage
public final class STBImage extends Object
STBImage relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • STBImage refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use STBImage when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The STB image reader.
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
